title: Show 186 -  Margaret Hodge
itunes:title: Show 186 -  Margaret Hodge
itunes:subtitle: Margaret Hodge tells the incredible story of beinâ€¦
description:
Margaret Hodge tells the incredible story of being a Jewish MP in Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party. Margaret describes her experience of antisemitism as well as the details of two specific conversations she had with the now suspended former leader. This is an astonishing personal testimony from someone who experienced the Labour Party at its worst. Margaret also shares her tips for defeating the BNP. Read the EHRC Report in Antisemitism in the Labour Party: https://www.equalityhumanrights.com/sites/default/files/investigation-into-antisemitism-in-the-labour-party.pdf Order 'Politically Homeless' here: https://blackwells.co.uk/bookshop/product/2100000262618 Order 'Called to Account' here: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Called-Account-Corporate-Behaviour-Government/dp/1408708078 Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde Follow Margaret on Twitter: @margarethodge Email the show: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com For the latest UK Government advice on coronavirus go to: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
